name: n-Mailer
tag_list: e-mail-marketing, crm-customer-relationship-management, e-marketing, e-pazarlama, zinli-pazarlama, permission-based-marketing, online-marketing, online-pazarlama, direct-mailing, e-posta, opt-in, kampanya-ynetimi, segmentasyon, relationship-marketing, one
overview:
n-Mailer SMTP is an authenticated SMTP mail service (also known as a n-Mailer Email Marketing Service) designed to solve most of the problems experienced when sending mail from your email program, application, server, cell phone or mobile device.

A variety of service plans are available such as prepaid, monthly and annual based on sent email volumes.

Track all of your outgoing messages with detailed stats and download delivery reports in the csv format (comma-separated).

Our pre-warmed up and white listed ips with major ISPs are ready to start inbox delivery for you.

Monitor your individual bounced emails, manage your lists and save your credits with a few clicks.

offices.address1: Büyükdere Cad. Maya Akar Center 100 - 102 C  Blok No:4
